response.overview: Glory & Gore is an independent student film following Brooks Vaughn, notorious ex-president of an elite university’s Symposium Club, as he returns to seemingly reclaim his role in a twisted game of power with Cassius Sinclair—an old friend who replaced him.  Written and directed by Gianna Cavarozzi and Lyanna Zammas, the film is composed of and created by a team of over 60 students, entirely grass-root and crowd-funded. Glory & Gore is an examination of wealth, class, cult mentalities, corruption, and masculinity through a feminine lens.  Glory & Gore, as you are able to view it today, is a proof of concept that its creators hope will become a greater feature film. As students working with limited time, funding, and resources, this film serves as a testament to all that this story can become. Its writers look forward to pursuing it, wherever it may take them. Thank you all so much for your support!
response.title: Glory & Gore
